What if you took a ziplock bag, make a small hole in the corner (just smaller than the 510 drip tip connector), place the hole over your device with out the drip tip attached, and attach your drip tip (making sure the plastic bag is secure)? That should waterproof pretty well, as only your drip tip would be exposed to the elements.
Pics please!
If you find a place that does wholesale you can buy like 100 for super cheap

I would say it probably is just a bad coil if it's that bad. Although, protank 3's have substantially worse airflow than the 2 I would get an aerotank base for your protank 3. They're relatively cheap and the parts are perfectly interchangeable. The aero base will allow you to change the airflow to your likings and will help the cloud production.

I would suggest buying a water tight container or just using those resealable plastic baggies and double bagging it to be safe and then vape when you're in a spot where you're not worried you'll drop it or get it wet. I've been emailing the makers if the life proof cases trying to get them to make some waterproof cases for ecigs, but I'm Not getting much back. I'm right there with you though. I would love to enjoy my vape in the tub or in a pool/body of water!
Id love to see a tank or dripper give away!

It could be nic sickness OR it could just be caused by the usual cause of hiccups. Hiccups are caused by your lungs having enough oxygen in them and the sharp intake of breath (hiccups) are just your body trying to get more oxygen into your lungs quickly.

Also let your girlfriend know that if she is serious about quitting analogs that the first 3-8 days(depending on how heavy a smoker she is) will be the hardest and to really push through it because the rewards and health benefits you will start to experience, even in the first and second weeks are by far worth it. By the end she won't even know why she started smoking in the first place

I know it's a different wicking system but as far as the kayfun style, you've named the only three worth mentioning. There's the T1 rebuild able that's probably as similar as it's going to get but I personally have not had a good experience with those But as far as vape experience and flavor/clouds go, the rsst and the kayfun styles are very similar. I didn't know any more kayfun style atomizers worth mentioning, so I offered one that had a pretty similar experience IMO.
Try out a smoktech rsst That's what I have on my setup right now It's not exactly the same but sort of close

Also spring break story: My roommates and I were in Colorado, so you know what was going down;). anyways we do our little pre game in our hotel and then we head out to the club. I apparently get a little white girl wasted and me, being a blackout drunk, raised a little bit of hell. When I woke up at our hotel (don't worry wee took a taxi) I was wearing a girls shirt, I had a bandana on my head like Tu pac and I had a new tattoo. On my ass. Of a cat. With a top hat. And a mustache. And a monocle. So now being back in Texas I've learned to love my new tat and I've named him seor Bigotes or mister whiskers. I've shown him to maybe thirty people I don't know so far and it's great

WRITING.TITLE: My girlfriend is the best:)
WRITING.TEXT:
The other night my girlfriend, who doesn't smoke because of school, came over to my house. My roommates and a couple of friends were all smoking, but I decided not to because sometimes I feel bad being high around her all the time when she can't. Half-way into their sesh she looks at me and says "why aren't you smoking babe?" And when I told her why she was like "fuck that! Go smoke babe. Have fun, don't worry about me." So I got super ripped then we had sex. :)
TH;DR my girlfriend said I could smoke even though she couldn't, got really high, had sex
It took me 19 years and I'm so very upset about that
Faithfully - journey
I turned 19 in October!

WRITING.TITLE: I got so high that I....

WRITING.TEXT: I have extreme anxiety and have for five or six years. I've found that if you completely relax about the situation and don't think yourself into an anxiety attack because it's your first time or that you're smoking in general you won't have any problems at all. Just treat it like you're taking anxiety meds that are natural and enjoy yourself. Since I started smoking I have minimal anxiety even if I haven't smoked. It just kind of calms you down:) Good luck

Yes but I'm saying you look sketchy as all get out if you straight up refuse a search and 100 percent of the time (in Texas at least) they bring the drug dogs. So I'm not saying you should say "oh yea officer get in and have a look. Take your time!" But you should definitely never make it seem like you have something to hide, that's always a recipe for disaster. I should have specified more.... But I'm not an idiot
Never say no to a search!! They always bring in a drug dog if you refuse!
